SEARCH
Package Backend.Entity

Class Report

Object
Report
public class Report extends Object
Represents a comprehensive report of internship opportunities. Generated by career center staff to analyze internship data including statistics by level, major, company, visibility, and slot availability. Reports can be filtered and saved to CSV files for record-keeping.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Allen
